an4.132:1.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.132:1.3: One who speaks on topic, but not fluently.
an4.132:1.4: One who speaks fluently, but not on topic.
an4.132:1.5: One who speaks on topic and fluently.
an4.132:1.6: One who speaks neither on topic nor fluently.
an4.132:1.7: These are the four people found in the world.”
